Docs.summary: Provides for a generic implementation of text marker properties.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A text marker is a symbol that is commonly used for bullets and auto-numbering. The following example shows all the different representations of a <xref:System.Windows.TextMarkerStyle>.
When you create a TextSimpleMarkerProperties object, you can create a custom text marker that is associated with an enumerated value of <xref:System.Windows.TextMarkerStyle>.
